title: Bath & Body Works Aromatherapy Balance Moisturizing Body Cream, 8 oz/226 g Ingredients and Reviews
description: Ingredients reviewed for Bath & Body Works Aromatherapy Balance Moisturizing Body Cream to be 82% Top Allergen Free and free of Gluten, Nickel, and Lanolin
cleaned_text: Fragrance Juniper Oil stimulates positivity & mental clarity. Coriander Oil helps regulate emotions. Overview This rich, non-greasy body cream provides 24-hour moisture with conditioning vitamin E & shea butter. An aromatherapy blend of essential oils & natural ingredients benefits body, mind & mood. Massage into skin, especially dry spots, to balance & bring harmony to the mind & body. Breathe deeply for best results.
